abstract.p: Correction of table of contents in Sept 24 Men's Fashions of The Times, Part 2 of Times Magazine, which omits credit for clothes worn on cover

block.p: The table of contents today in Men's Fashions of The Times, Part 2 of The Times Magazine, omits a credit for the clothes worn by the actor Tobey Maguire on the cover. They are a single-breasted peak-lapel wool suit, $2,000, with cotton dress shirt, $270, and silk tie, $130, by Yves Saint Laurent Rive Gauche Homme. At Yves Saint Laurent Boutique Homme, 88 Wooster Street, New York. Photograph by Brigitte Lacombe. Grooming by Giannandrea for Garren New York.
